name: cermont-app
description: Cermont - Sistema de Gestión de Órdenes de Trabajo

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter api dev & pnpm --filter web dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter api lint && pnpm --filter web lint
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter api typecheck && pnpm --filter web typecheck
scripts.prisma:migrate: pnpm --filter api exec prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy: pnpm --filter api exec prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate:reset: pnpm --filter api exec prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules .next dist build out
